results.definition: expand and contract rhythmically; beat rhythmically
examples: The baby's heart was pulsating again after the surgeon massaged it

results.definition: move with or as if with a regular alternating motion
examples: the city pulsated with music and excitement

results.definition: produce or modulate (as electromagnetic waves) in the form of short bursts or pulses or cause an apparatus to produce pulses
examples: a transmitter pulsed by an electronic tube
